text: Susanne Kit Nissen Pottier Slotsager (born April 29, 1966 in Hørsholm, Denmark) is a Danish female curler. She is a two-time and . She is a participant of the 1992 Winter Olympics (where curling was a demonstration sport) and the 2002 Winter Olympics. ==Teams== {| class="wikitable" |- ! scope="col"| Season ! scope="col"| Skip ! scope="col"| Third !
